burgers.title: Classic Burger
burgers.description: A classic beef burger with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

burgers.title: Scary Chicken Burger
burgers.description: A frightfully delicious crispy chicken fillet topped with crispy bacon, caramelized onions, melted cheddar cheese, and tangy pickles, all served on a toasted bun with a spicy mayo sauce.

burgers.title: Double Delight Burger
burgers.description: A mouthwatering burger featuring two juicy beef patties, fresh onions, tangy pickles, ripe tomatoes, crisp lettuce, and a nice clean sauce, all nestled in a toasted bun.

burgers.title: Ultimate Bacon Double Cheese Burger
burgers.description: A towering burger with two juicy beef patties, each layered with melted cheese, crispy bacon, roasted onions, fresh chili, and a flavorful dressing sauce, all served on a toasted bun.

burgers.title: Double Cheese Extravaganza Burger
burgers.description: A delectable burger featuring two large beef patties, layered with melted cheddar and Swiss cheese, all served on a toasted bun.

burgers.title: Spicy Jalapeno Cheeseburger
burgers.description: A flavorful burger with a juicy beef patty, melted cheese, crisp Batavia lettuce, spicy jalapenos, red onions, and a tangy dressing, all served on a toasted bun.

burgers.title: Onion Lover's Burger
burgers.description: A juicy large beef patty topped with melted cheese, savory grilled onions, and tangy pickled onions, all served on a toasted bun.

burgers.title: BBQ Bacon Cheese Burger
burgers.description: A delicious burger featuring a juicy beef patty topped with smoky BBQ sauce, melted cheddar and Emmental cheese, crispy bacon, and tangy pickles, all served on a toasted sesame bun.

burgers.title: Triple Chili Bacon Burger
burgers.description: A massive burger featuring three juicy beef patties, melted cheese, spicy chili, crisp Batavia lettuce, and crispy bacon, all served on a toasted bun.

burgers.title: Crispy Chicken Burger
burgers.description: Crispy breaded chicken fillet served with lettuce, tomato, and mayo.

burgers.title: Bacon Avocado Burger
burgers.description: Juicy beef patty topped with crispy bacon, sliced avocado, lettuce, tomato, and ranch dressing.

sides.title: Onion Rings
sides.description: Crispy golden onion rings served with your choice of dipping sauce.

sides.title: Sweet Potato Fries
sides.description: Delicious sweet potato fries lightly seasoned and served with a side of aioli.

sides.title: Garlic Parmesan Fries
sides.description: Crispy fries tossed in garlic butter and grated Parmesan cheese, served with ranch dipping sauce.

sides.title: Loaded Nachos
sides.description: Tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapenos, black beans, salsa, sour cream, and guacamole.

sides.title: Caesar Salad
sides.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in Caesar dressing with croutons and grated Parmesan cheese.

sides.title: Fries
sides.description: The most classic crispy fries, the favorite side to every burger

drinks.title: Iced Tea
drinks.description: Refreshing iced tea available in lemon or peach flavor.

drinks.title: Lemonade
drinks.description: Classic lemonade made with freshly squeezed lemons and a hint of sweetness.

drinks.title: Mango Smoothie
drinks.description: A tropical blend of ripe mangoes, yogurt, and a touch of honey.

drinks.title: Soda
drinks.description: Classic Soda excellent drink of different flavors, perfect for all items on the menu.

drinks.title: Strawberry Lemonade
drinks.description: A refreshing blend of tart lemonade and sweet strawberries.

desserts.title: Chocolate Brownie Sundae
desserts.description: Warm chocolate brownie topped with vanilla ice cream, chocolate syrup, whipped cream, and a cherry on top.

desserts.title: New York Cheesecake
desserts.description: Creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust, served plain or with your choice of fruit topping.

desserts.title: Apple Pie
desserts.description: Classic American apple pie served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

desserts.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
desserts.description: Decadent chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

desserts.title: Strawberry Shortcake
desserts.description: Layers of fluffy sponge cake with fresh strawberries and whipped cream.
